tooltip.logicates.and_logicate: Emits a signal if both inputs are powered.
tooltip.logicates.or_logicate: Emits a signal if either input is powered.
tooltip.logicates.xor_logicate: Emits a signal if only one of the inputs is powered.
tooltip.logicates.nand_logicate: Emits a signal unless both inputs are powered.
tooltip.logicates.nor_logicate: Emits a signal if no input is powered.
tooltip.logicates.xnor_logicate: Emits a signal if both inputs are equal.
